completedItems.title: feat: Add `agent` table and rename `user` to `entity` table, add multi-tenancy
completedItems.body:
This PR splits the `users` table into `agents` and `entities`. Entities is a more general term which could encompass non-user objects in the future.
Platform-specific user data is stored in the `metadata` field.
